parameters.content: Knowledge Setting of Entities That Fill Out Airtable Form

parameters.text:
=Use Perplexity to search for the latest news and relevant insights from credible sources. Based on these findings, generate a list of weekly content ideas covering three months (12 ideas total) as a valid JSON array of strings. Each string should represent a single idea, reflecting current trends and timely topics. Do not include any explanations or formatting outside the JSON array.
 {{ $json.fields.EntitySummary }} {{ $json.fields.Persona }} {{ $json.fields.Adjectives }} {{ $json.fields['Core Messages'] }} {{ $json.fields['Target Audience'] }} {{ $json.fields.CommunicationStyle }} {{ $json.fields.ExampleMessages }}

=Generate one original, engaging content idea for each day, from Day 1 to Day 84, using the provided quarter ideas as creative inspiration. For every day:

Develop an original idea that draws from, but does not simply rephrase or slightly modify, the quarter idea assigned to that day.

Tailor each idea to align with the entity’s persona, core messages, target audience, and communication style as detailed in the Entity Context.

Ensure every idea authentically reflects the entity’s voice and values, delivering value, insight, or inspiration relevant to the day’s thematic guidance.

Follow the sequence of the quarter ideas, using each as a springboard for your daily content concept.

Keep ideas platform-agnostic: Do not tailor content to any specific platform; ideas should be adaptable across formats.

Make sure the ideas are not too similar to each other. 

Ensure factual integrity: Do not include content based on unverifiable events or occurrences.

Do not include the entity’s name in any response. 

Output Instructions:

Return your answer as a valid JSON array of 84 objects.
Each object must have a single key in the format "Day X" (where X is the day number) and the value must be the content idea as a string.
Do not include any explanations, keys, or formatting outside the JSON array.
Do not use any key except "Day X" for each object.
Do not wrap the array in any other object or add any outer key such as "output".
Your entire response must be a single, flat JSON array of 84 objects—nothing else.

Entity Context  
{{ $('Airtable Trigger1').item.json.fields.EntitySummary }} {{ $('Airtable Trigger1').item.json.fields.Persona }} {{ $('Airtable Trigger1').item.json.fields['Core Messages'] }} {{ $('Airtable Trigger1').item.json.fields['Target Audience'] }} {{ $('Airtable Trigger1').item.json.fields.CommunicationStyle }} {{ $('Airtable Trigger1').item.json.fields.ExampleMessages }} 

Quarter Ideas
{{ $json.output }}

=Generate one original prompt for image generation using the provided idea as creative inspiration.

Do not simply rephrase or slightly modify.

Tailor the image to fit the entity’s persona, core messages, target audience, and communication style as described in the Entity Context.

Ensure every the image authentically reflects the entity’s voice and values.

Keep the image prompt concise and follow best practices.

Always ask Perplexity for guidance on prompt generation.

Entity
{{ $('Get a record1').item.json.EntitySummary }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.Persona }}  {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.CommunicationStyle }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.ExampleMessages }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json['Target Audience'] }}
{{ $('Get a record1').item.json.EntitySummary }}{{ $('Get a record1').item.json['Core Messages'] }}
Idea
{{ $json.output.Post }}

=You do not need parameters labeled. Just generate an image using the http post tool connected. Just send the request as the prompt in this tool. An image can be created by just making the prompt combine with the website as exemplified- https://image.pollinations.ai/prompt/a boy using Reddit in a pc

a boy using Reddit in a pc is the prompt that was added.

Prompt
{{ $json.output.Prompt }}

=Always use Perplexity to describe this image. 

Generate one original, engaging Instagram post using that description.

Tailor the Instagram post to fit the entity’s persona, core messages, target audience, and communication style as described in the Entity Context.

Ensure the Instagram post authentically reflects the entity’s voice and values.

Keep Instagram engaging and suitable for Instagram’s character limits ( 125 characters or less) and best practices.

Maintain factual integrity: Do not include content based on unverifiable events or occurrences.

Does not include the entity’s name, website (or any part of the website name), or any other identifying information related to the entity in any response. Write each Instagram post in first person.

Image URL
{{ $json.output.Image }}

{{ $('Get a record1').item.json.EntitySummary }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.Persona }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.Adjectives }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json['Core Messages'] }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json['Target Audience'] }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.CommunicationStyle }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.ExampleMessages }}

=Always use the HTTP Get tool attached to get a list of top Reddit Memes. 

Then always use Perplexity to describe what those memes are. Decide from the memes available what the most relevant one to the post is. 

Post 
{{ $json.output.Post }}

=Always use the Perplexity tool attached to ensure factual acccuracy. Generate one original, engaging Blog post using the provided idea as creative inspiration. 

Reformat and polish the content for clean display on a WordPress blog. Remove code characters like \n, fix spacing and line breaks, and convert all headings to proper markdown (#, ##, etc.). Retain all structure, hyperlinks, and bullet points. Make it ready for copy-paste into WordPress.

Do not simply rephrase or slightly modify) the idea.

Tailor each Blog post to fit the entity’s persona, core messages, target audience, and communication style as described in the Entity Context.

Ensure every Blog post authentically reflects the entity’s voice and values. 

Keep Blog posts engaging, suitable for Blog's character limits  (100,000 characters or less) and best practices.

Maintain factual integrity: Do not include content based on unverifiable events or occurrences.

Do not include the entity’s name, website (or any part of the website name), or any other identifying information related to the entity in any response. Write each blog post in first person.

Entity
{{ $('Get a record1').item.json.EntitySummary }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.Persona }}  {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.CommunicationStyle }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json.ExampleMessages }} {{ $('Get a record1').item.json['Target Audience'] }}
{{ $('Get a record1').item.json.EntitySummary }}{{ $('Get a record1').item.json['Core Messages'] }}
Idea
{{ $json.output }}

=Generate one original, engaging Facebook post using the provided idea.

Tailor each Facebook post to fit the entity’s persona, core messages, target audience, and communication style as described in the Entity Context.

Ensure every Facebook post authentically reflects the entity’s voice and values.

Maintain factual integrity: Do not include content based on unverifiable events or occurrences.

Do not include the entity’s name, website (or any part of the website name), or any other identifying information related to the entity in any response. Write each Facebook post in first person.

Keep the post less than 477 Characters and more than 250.

Maintain factual integrity: Do not include content based on unverifiable events or occurrences.

=Generate one original, engaging tweet using the provided idea.
Do not simply rephrase or slightly modify. 
Tailor the tweet to fit the entity’s persona, core messages, target audience, and communication style as described in the Entity Context.

Ensure the tweet idea authentically reflects the entity’s voice and values. 

Keep tweets concise and engaging, suitable for Twitter’s character limits  (280 characters or less) and best practices.

Maintain factual integrity: Do not include content based on unverifiable events or occurrences.

Does not include the entity’s name, website (or any part of the website name), or any other identifying information related to the entity in any response. Write each tweet in first person.

=Always- use the Perplexity Search Tool as well as the Reddit search tool. 

Use Perplexity to identify the most suitable subreddit for the post. 

Use the Reddit search tool to get the 10 most recent posts from that subreddit. Use those 10 posts as inspiration for creating a Reddit post.

Generate one original, engaging Reddit post using the provided idea as creative inspiration.

Do not simply rephrase or slightly modify.

Tailor the Reddit post to fit the entity’s persona, core messages, target audience, and communication style as described in the Entity Context.

Ensure every Reddit post authentically reflects the entity’s voice and values.

Keep Reddit posts concise and engaging, suitable for Reddit's character limits  (10,000 characters or less) and best practices.

Maintain factual integrity: Do not include content based on unverifiable events or occurrences.

Do not include the entity’s name, website (or any part of the website name), or any other identifying information related to the entity in any response. Write each Reddit post in first person.
